law.catch_line: A unit may not charge a fee to access eMaryland Marketplace....

text.section: A unit may not charge a fee to access eMaryland Marketplace.

section.section: The Department of Budget and Management may establish fees for the use of eMaryland Marketplace by an entity that publishes a notice of a procurement, conducts a procurement, or publishes a notice of award.
The Department of Budget and Management may not charge a unit, as defined in § 11-101(x) of this article, a fee under this subsection.
